issues.description: The solution repository defines an interface named 'Dairy' for the milking behavior, while the problem statement and template refer to this concept as the 'Milkable' interface. This naming mismatch prevents students from mapping the required 'Milkable' interface to the solution implementation.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the 'Dairy' interface and its file to 'Milkable', and update all references in Goat.java and Seal.java to implement 'Milkable' instead of 'Dairy'.
